article_title: Israel ends three-week offensive in north Gaza town
sentence: During  the  operation,  the  bodies  of  seven  Israelis  killed  during  the  Hamas  attack  on  Israel  on  7  October  and  taken  to  Gaza  were  discovered  and  repatriated.

article_title: Israel ends three-week offensive in north Gaza town
sentence: Meanwhile,  the  prospect  of  renewed  ceasefire  talks  has  further  dimmed  after  Hamas  said  on  Thursday  that  it  would  not  negotiate  "in  light  of  [Israel's]  aggression,  killing,  siege,  starvation  and  genocide  of  our  people".

article_title: Israel ends three-week offensive in north Gaza town
sentence: The  war  began  in  October  when  Hamas  gunmen  launched  an  unprecedented  attack  on  Israel,  killing  about  1,200  people  and  taking  252  back  to  Gaza  as  hostages.

article_title: Israel ends three-week offensive in north Gaza town
sentence: More  than  36,000  people  in  Gaza  have  been  killed  in  the  Israeli  offensive,  the  territory's  Hamas-run  health  ministry  says.
